thread.title: Fallout 4 PS5 and Xbox Series X|S Versions Out April 25, New Content and Update Details Revealed
thread.title_full: Fallout 4 PS5 and Xbox Series X|S Versions Out April 25, New Content and Update Details Revealed

author: Alex Co
title: Fallout 4 PS5 and Xbox Series X|S Versions Out April 25, New Content and Update Details Revealed
text:
With Amazon Prime’s Fallout TV series now out, Bethesda is riding the hype train with Fallout 4. Released back in 2015, the studio has announced the Fallout 4 PS5 and Xbox Series X|S versions will be available on April 25 as a free upgrade to existing game owners.
Fallout 4 PS5 and Xbox Series X|S Version Features: Will feature Performance and Quality mode settings Stability improvements and fixes 60 frames-per-second and increased resolutions Those on PS4 and Xbox One, expect a title update to usher in stability improvements, login and quest fixes.
PC players won’t be left out of the update roll out, as Bethesda plans to roll out an update for PC!
Fallout 4 Upcoming PC Update Features: Widescreen and ultra widescreen support incoming Fixes to Creation Kit Quest updates Stability, mod and bug fixes Japanese and Chinese language players on PC will have Bethesda.net login issues resolved fixing access to mods Fallout 4 will also be available on the Epic Games Store, and will also be Steam Deck verified.
The Fallout 4 support isn’t stopping there. Bethesda will also introduce new Creation Club items with the update.
Enclave Remnants
Enclave Remnants brings the Pre-War cabal, The Enclave, into the Fallout 4 storyline. In this new quest, “Echoes of the Past,” can you stop The Enclave from spreading their dangerous ideology and gaining a foothold in the Commonwealth?
Along with workshop items and the Enclave Colonel uniform, we are including the following previously released Creation Club content:
Enclave Weapon Skins Enclave Armor Skins Tesla Cannon Hellfire Power Armor X-02 Power Armor Heavy Incinerator Makeshift Weapon Pack
Ever thought a piggy bank would make a great weapon in a pinch? This weapon pack includes a variety of unconventional objects that have been transformed into deadly weapons, such as: a baseball launcher, a nail gun and a piggy bank.
Halloween Workshop
Leftover from an ill-fated Halloween party, thrown by the New England Technocrat Society, these 38 new Halloween decorations include witches, cauldrons, ghouls and more! Decorate for Halloween or make your settlements spooky all year round!
Once the update is out, we’ll be sure to let our readers know. If you’re not sure whether to watch the Fallout TV series on Amazon, go read our Season 1 review to see what we thought of it,
